const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const i={a:"a",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return r(n,{children:[r(i.p,{children:["Hello! I'm ",e(i.strong,{children:"Tom Jin"}),", currently working as a ",e(i.strong,{children:"frontend developer"})," in Taiwan, with a focus on React and Next frameworks."]}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"My work includes client UI, admin dashboard UI, front-end logic design, and RESTful APIs."}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"In addition to my work, I've recently started to actively participate in open source projects on GitHub, and I'm working on a personal blog to share my thoughts and experiences through writing."}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"In my spare time, I enjoy reading comics 📚, playing video games 🎮, basketball 🏀, and watching movies 🎥."}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"Thank you for taking the time to read my profile. If you have any questions about my experience or suggestions for my blog, please feel free to contact me!"}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Experience"}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",r(i.li,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"2022 - Present"}),"．Frontend developer at ",e(i.a,{href:"https://ibears.io/",children:"@ibears.io"}),"."]}),"
",r(i.li,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"2017 - 2021"}),"．Graduated from Ming Chuan University - Department of Computer and Engineering."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"Contact"}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",e(i.li,{children:e(i.a,{href:"https://github.com/tommm2",children:"Github"})}),"
",e(i.li,{children:e(i.a,{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/jinrup/",children:"Linkedin"})}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:r}=n.components||{};return r?e(r,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const i={a:"a",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return r(n,{children:[r(i.p,{children:["哈囉！我是",e(i.strong,{children:"Tom Jin 金政融"}),"，我是一位",e(i.strong,{children:"前端工程師"}),"，專注於使用 React 和 Next 框架進行專案開發。"]}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"我的工作範疇包括開發客戶端前台 UI、管理員後台 UI、前端邏輯的設計，以及 RESTful API 的串接。除了工作之外，我最近開始在 GitHub 上積極參與開源專案，同時致力於打造個人部落格，透過寫作分享自己的想法和經驗。"}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"在閒暇時，我喜歡閱讀漫畫📚、打電動🎮、籃球🏀，還有欣賞各種電影🎥。"}),"
",e(i.p,{children:"感謝您抽空閱讀我的簡介。如果對我的經歷有任何疑問或對我的部落格有建議，非常歡迎與我聯繫！"}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"工作經歷"}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",r(i.li,{children:[e(i.strong,{children:"2022 - 現在"}),"．在",e(i.a,{href:"https://ibears.io/",children:"小熊科技"}),"擔任前端工程師"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(i.h2,{children:"聯絡我"}),"
",r(i.ul,{children:["
",e(i.li,{children:e(i.a,{href:"https://github.com/tommm2",children:"Github"})}),"
",e(i.li,{children:e(i.a,{href:"https://www.linkedin.com/in/jinrup/",children:"Linkedin"})}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:r}=n.components||{};return r?e(r,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};
